title: Kicked me out of a game and not letting me join back
body:
I was playing a game then a attempting to reconnect popped up and when I try to restart League it says I am not in a match. When I am checking op.gg it says I am in game but  I am queued up right now so that is not possible.

EDIT: Okay I just completed a whole new game and I had 0 LP lost and its not in my match history.

replies.body: Ahhhhh it sounds like you ran into a game that crashed on the server. When that happens everybody gets booted from the game, and it can sometimes still shows up on sites like op.gg for a little bit. No worries though, when it does happen nobody will get any penalties and everyone should be able to queue back up immediately after the game.
